TopicTitle: Philanthropist wants to trade cash for science

Articles.Content:
The British Aero-Nautical Group (B.A.N.G) have earned quite a lot of money from their various engineering subsidiaries at KSC but are running out of science to further their product development. Are there any brilliant but broke scientists out there who would trade 500 science points for v1000,000 in cash? (used notes)

In other words, I am a reasonably good engineer but a lousy scientist, so am flush with cash but need the science to unlock some tech for a new project and, according to what I consider "legitimate' business practice", I am prepared to pay for it by hacking my persistent.cfg to -1000,000funds for +500 sci.

However, it would ease my conscience if I could help someone in the community who needs funds so we could do a deal. Can share funds between several others if mutually agreeable? I would post screenshots of before & after if you need a receipt!

Any takers?
I generally approve of this idea. I am, however, not in a position to take advantage of it.

> 
> Lol really? How honest.

Deadly serious. I may cheat, but I try to cheat in an ethical way ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
